title: Top Apple Executives Sold Millions of Dollars of Stock
text:
Apple stock has risen in recent months and two top executives at the iPhone maker recently sold millions of dollars of shares through planned transactions.

Apple stock (ticker: AAPL) was slipping in May on worries of overvaluation and trade-war fears. Then shares changed direction. They began to rise in early June and, for the most part, have steadily climbed since, aided by strong earnings and demand for the iPhone 11. Apple stock set a 52-week intraday high of $237.64 on Friday. Shares now sport a year-to-date surge of...
description: The chief financial officer and chief operating officer cashed in through planned transactions as Apple stock traded to 52-week intraday highs.
